content: Is there any coordination for making rollups, or is it ok just to create one any time? Are there any objections if I occasionally make one? (I don't think I have ever done it.)
no real coordination, can be created anytime
there's some instructions after clicking the button before you confirm

ok, I might give it a try later today

hah, I wrote most of that page :smile:

yeah go ahead and do it. Just ensure you check the queue if there are any open rollups or ones which were running and failed recently and if possible triage the fault (just to avoid the same pr being included again)
